page.title: 10Trade(2) in Leverton
page.content: Another family business is the local garage which is situated on the main road.It serves petrol and services cars and is an M.O.T.station.They have the {Hyundai }franchise and sell new and used cars of many other makes and there is an accident repair shop which resprays and repairs damaged vehicles.It opens at 8-00am and closes at 8-00pm in the summer or 6-00pm in the winter six days per week. Our local builder not only builds houses but also erects farm buildings of all types and has built two nearby village halls. He will also carry out repairs and maintenance and build extensions to existing properties.As very little new building is done in the village much of his work is carried out elsewhere in the surrounding area.
